short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a reliable way to restore closed tabs. Never lost a tab again!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features

* Shows a list of recently closed tabs
* Restores recently closed tabs via a toolbar button
* Customizes the number of recently closed tabs to show
